data.title: ALL SOAPS: Best and Worst Recasts
data.meta_description: The role of ________ will now be played by! List some of the soaps best and worst recasts. (This may have been done before...) No particular order BEST Lesli Kay as Felicia Forrester, B&B Robin Strasser as Dorian Lord, OLTL (I never saw other Dorians but you can assume right?) Billy Miller as...
data.text:
The role of ________ will now be played by!

List some of the soaps best and worst recasts. (This may have been done before...)

No particular order

BEST

Lesli Kay as Felicia Forrester, B&B

Robin Strasser as Dorian Lord, OLTL (I never saw other Dorians but you can assume right?)

Billy Miller as Billy Abbott (Y&R)

Peter Bergman as Jack Abbot (never saw Terry Lester but - I'm thinking of how the actor has been able to embody the role and become known for it)

Jess Walton as Jill Foster Abbott (same reasoning as above)

Jeff Branson as Shane, GL (havent seen the others but this one really looks like he could be J&R's son)

Judith Chapman as Gloria Fisher Abbott, Y&R (Sorry JVA but you can pick up your face and go home. Judith Chapman owns the role, even if she should walk around with her hand cupped in front of her face in case her eyeballs fall out)

Billy Magnussen as Casey Hughes, ATWT

Hunt Block as Craig Montgomery, ATWT

Trevor St. John as Todd Manning, OLTL (ducking veggies)

Kassie DePaiva as Blair Cramer, OLTL

WORST

Noelle Beck as Lily Snider ATWT

Almost any of ATWT's recent mishaps

Charity Rahmer as Belle Black (This one owns it I'm sure)

Christina Chambers as Molly Conlan McKinnon, ATWT

Christina Chambers as Marty Saybrook, OLTL

Amelia Heinle as Victoria Newman, Y&R

Tammin Sursok as Colleen Carlton, Y&R

Jon Lindstrom as Craig Montgomery

Jennifer Bransford as Carly Corinthos, GH

there are scores more! Let us know what you think

Repetitive but I love this particular subject

BEST:

Carrie Genzel as Skye Chandler, All My Children

Carrington Garland as Kelly Capwell, Santa Barbara

Jess Walton as Jill Abbott, The Young and the Restless

Gordon Thomson as Mason Capwell, Santa Barbara

Karen Witter as Tina Lord, One Life To Live

Michael Lowry as Jake Martin, All My Children

Cady McClain as Rosanna Cabot, As The World Turns

Winsor Harmon as Thorne Forrester, The Bold and the Beautiful

Sean Kanan as AJ Quartermaine, General Hospital

Kimberly Simms as Mindy Lewis, Guiding Light

Hunt Block as Craig Montgomery, As The World Turns

Peter Bergman as Jack Abbott, The Young & the Restless

Brenda Epperson as Ashley Abbott, The Young and the Restless

Robin Mattson as Janet Green, All My Children

WORST

Susan Batten as Luna, er Connor Walsh, As The World Turns

Eileen Davidson as Kelly Capwell, Santa Barbara

Terry Lester as Jack, er Mason Capwell, Santa Barbara

Christina Chambers as Marty Saybrooke, One Life To Live

Krista Allen as Billie Reed, Days of our Lives

Ann Hamilton as Mindy Lewis, Guiding Light

Christina Chambers as Molly Conlon, As The World Turns

Glynnis O'Connor as Margo Hughes, As The World Turns

Jeffrey Meek as Craig Montgomery, As The World Turns

Best recasts

I think one of the most successful one in recent years is probably Austin Peck replacing Patrick Muldoon. The recast went on to sort of personify soap hunkdom.

Jill Larson as Opal on AMC was good, but she is no Dorothy Lyman.

Cady McCain as a brilliant recast as Dixie Cooney.

Jay Kenneth Johnson gets the award for best re-recast in reclaiming his Philip role on DOOL.

There are so many...the guy who played Nik on GH while Tyler Christopher took a few years off was good. John Ingle is great as Edward Quartermaine.

B&B

Good

Heather Tom as Katie (Not great so far, but it's not her fault)

Lesli Kay as Fefe (Colleen Dion was great originally, but Lesli Kay fits Felicia now)

Winsor Harmon as Thorne

Jacq M-W as Steffy (Spot on for looks and one of the best younger cast members in a long while)

Kyle Lowder as Rick (Not a huge fan of him, but he's better than Torkildsen, IMO)

Bad

Emily Harrison as Bridget (I don't think she would've been that bad had she not followed JenFin so quickly)

I guess we haven't had that many recasts, especially compared to other shows.

BEST

Jess Walton as Jill Abbott, Y&R ("Yes I wanted to hurt Katherine! She killed my Phillip!" The Greatest Recast Ever)

Peter Bergman as Jack Abbott, Y&R ("Have a seat, on me!")

Billy Miller as Billy Abbott, Y&R

Lauren Koslow as Kate Roberts, DAYS (while I too love Deborah Adair I think Koslow reinvented the role and gave Kate staying power, passion and bite)

Martha Madison as Belle Black, DAYS (she's a great young actress, DAYS really blew it on that one!)

Lesli Kay as Felicia Forrester, B&B

Winsor Harmon as Thorne Forrester, B&B (plays rage better than anyone)

Austin Peck as Brad Snyder, ATWT (who knew he could act!? He's got an 'aww shucks' style that is perfect in that role)

Joan Collins as Alexandra Spaulding, GL ("I'm Alexandra Spaulding and I couldn't care less!" She can read the phone bookd and I love her)

Constance Towers as Helena Cassadine, GH (Ice Cold Blonde, perfect)

Anne Heche as Vicki and Marley Love, AW ("So is that why you jumped into that sack with your son in law *slap*)

Carmen Duncan as Iris Cory, AW (not everyone's taste...but I LOVED her, much sexier and more humorous than Beverlee McKinsey's Iris, she played her light and I loved it)

Jill Larson as Opal Courtland, AMC

Dan Gauthier as Kevin Buchanan, OLTL (ABC really blew it with him)

WORST

Amelia Heinle as Victoria Newman, Y&R (dull but I bet she might just improve, she's got a cute baby though)

Tammin Sursock as Colleen Carlton, Y&R (can't get her accent right, doesn't look like she cares to be there...just...no)

Susan Walters as Diane Jenkins, Y&R (Alex Donnelly IS Diane Jenkins)

Rachel Kimsey as Mackenzie Browning, Y&R (smarmy, sugar coated crap)

Mackenzie Mauzy as Phoebe Forrester, B&B (can't act her way out of a paper bag, thank you for killing her off Brad!)

Phelice Sempler as Donna Love, AW (Anna Stuart IS Donna Love)

Josh Taylor as Roman Brady, DAYS (loved him on The Hogan Family, loved him on Y&R, loved him on DAYS as Chris...)

Charity Rhamer as Belle Black, DAYS (there are no words...)
